name: Simple Twitter Timeline
author: Sasa Karanovic

sections.description: Displays a sidebar with your latest tweets. You can define number of tweets, title and twitter username shown at your settings page. Also to display the widget on your home page please go to your widgets page and add Sale’s Twitter Timeline to your sidebar.

short_description: Displays a sidebar with your latest tweets. You can define number of tweets, title and twitter username shown at your settings page. Also to display the widget on your home page please go to your widgets page and add Sale's Twitter Timeline to your sidebar.
